description:
- Let`s join forces, Sinbad! -
Sinbad has brought his battleship to the surface to protect the shop from Azazel`s attack.
He attempts to turn the tables by firing a bombardment, but the output is too low!
It seems he needs to gather up and display the power of manliness for the bombardment to work.
Can Ren`s own spirit of manliness shine in to help Sinbad?!

titles.title: 炸裂! セブンス・ギャラクシー
